post:
<img src="http://inceptionhosting.com/logob.png" />

Updated offers list from Inception Hosting, please feel free to contact me as always with any questions or concerns, I am always happy to give 3+ Month members a free trial with no commitment to make sure it is the right solution for you.

4 x CPU Cores (E5-2620) equal share

45 GB Raid 10 Disk space (6 disk dedicated storage array)
1 TB Bandwidth @ gbit
1 x IPv4
5 x IPv6 (additional IPv6 free on request)
</pre>

**More Info**

<img src="http://i.imgur.com/9urNgFK.jpg" />

**Network and Locations**

<pre>
UK-v4: 149.255.111.9
UK-V6: 2a03:ca80:8007::4ca8:da1
Servers with OpenITC in Rapidswitch DC

USA Phoenix: 199.231.84.66
Phoenix Servers with IOFlood in PhoenixNAP

USA Miami: 64.188.46.128 / 2607:f2e0:10f:f:1234:1234:5715:58dc
Miami Servers in coresite/Miami IX
General Notes

No TOR/Public Proxy No IRC Servers in USA (DC enforced port filtering in place for common IRC ports) absolutely no crypto currency mining.

No Bulk Mailing 

Servers are self managed by your expert fingers 

Payment via PayPal, BitPay or Moneybookers/Skrill 

Nodes are a mix on E3-1270(NL), X3470(Phoenix), E5-2620(Miami), E5630/45(UK) All Nodes are Raid 10 with either 4, 6 or 8 disks.

2 Day refund policy in place, please read the terms, if you choose to set up a subscription payment it is your responsibility to maintain, any over payments are held as account credit.

CPU Cores are on an ----> equal share basis 

</pre>



Thanks as always for reading, if anyone wants a custom quote let me know, VPS packages available up to 16GB Ram.

Please read the terms :)
